critique: It should be a tree with multiple colors, not just a silhouette.

temporal.caption: A man is seated in front of a canvas.
He is using a palette to paint an ombre scene.
He then covers the ombre to a silhouette of a tree on a hill.

captions.full: A man is seated in front of a canvas. He is using a palette to paint an ombre scene. He then covers the ombre to a silhouette of a tree on a hill.
